title: How to Beat 50/20 Mode in Ultimate Custom Night

steps.title: Download and boot up Ultimate Custom Night.
steps.content: Download and boot up Ultimate Custom Night. You can try playing some preset challenges for practicing purpose or just messing around.

steps.title: Set all characters to 20.
steps.content: Set all characters to 20. After that, remember to use all Power-Ups that you have, except DD Repel as it makes no difference in 50/20 mode. Hit "GO!" once you're ready.

steps.title: Switch off the fan and switch on the Power Generator right after the night starts.
steps.content: Switch off the fan and switch on the Power Generator right after the night starts. This can save some of your powers.

steps.title: Deal with Mediocre Melodies.
steps.content: Deal with Mediocre Melodies. Lift up monitor and close the right vent door. This will prevent BB or JJ from entering your office. Open the door again after you hear a "thud" noise. Switch to Duct System and put the audio lure in the middle left position. So that when animatronics in the ducts who try to go through left duct will get stuck at the audio lure.

steps.title: Deal with Toy Freddy.
steps.content: Deal with Toy Freddy. Change the camera to CAM 08, and check Toy Freddy's monitor to find Mr. Hugs. Close the proper door to prevent Mr. Hugs from jumpscaring Toy Freddy. Collect some Faz-coins around the camera if possible. Change the camera to CAM 07 as soon as you're done.

steps.title: Take care of the music box.
steps.content: Take care of the music box. Close the monitor and put on the mask just in case Golden Freddy appears and you aren't aware. Turn on Global Music Box 10-15 seconds after the night starts. So it's important to check the timer at the top right corner of the screen.

steps.title: Start farming Faz-coins.
steps.content: Start farming Faz-coins. Keep lifting up and down the monitor and putting the mask on. Everytime when you put down the monitor, close the right vent door to block BB or JJ and earn a Faz-coin each time. Click on Helpy if he appears to earn another Faz-coin.

steps.title: Wait for XOR (aka Shadow DD) to appear.
steps.content: Wait for XOR (aka Shadow DD) to appear. She is an exclusive character in 50/20 mode and will spawn all 6 secret characters. Wait for her to spawn 2 characters before the next step.

steps.title: Buy the Death Coin.
steps.content: Buy the Death Coin. Close the left door, middle vent door and right vent door before lifting up the monitor. Use heater too for a short period of time to prevent Mediocre Melodies from attacking you. Activate Global Music Box again. Buy the Death Coin at the Prize Corner.

steps.title: Get rid of Funtime Foxy and Plushtrap.
steps.content: Get rid of Funtime Foxy and Plushtrap. Move the camera to CAM 04. Use the Death Coin on Funtime Foxy by clicking the small icon on the top right corner of the screen. Look at Plushtrap for a while until he runs away. Remember to switch the camera to CAM 02 or else you will be attacked later.

steps.title: Deal with other animatronics.
steps.content: Deal with other animatronics. Deal with all animatronics that appears around your office. Use the Power A/C if Nightmare Chica appears, click Bonnet's nose if she appears, and type L-O-L if Lolbit appears.

steps.title: Make sure the figurine on the desk is Bonnie.
steps.content: Make sure the figurine on the desk is Bonnie. If not, wait for around 6 seconds, close the left door and middle vent door while using the heater for a while, and lift the camera up and down until Bonnie figurine appears on the desk.

steps.title: Save your power.
steps.content: Save your power. Keep switching between Global Music Box with Power Generator and fan for a certain amount of time.

steps.title: Hold the ventilation error till the last moment.
steps.content: Hold the ventilation error till the last moment. If the ventilation error is staring to appear, wait until the last moment before you lift up the monitor and reset it.

steps.title: Focus on the night and pray for luck.
steps.content: Focus on the night and pray for luck. Keep dealing with other animatronics appeared, and keep praying for luck so Toy Freddy won't jumpscare you. This is because Toy Freddy has a chance that he won't kill you for the whole night. Focus on the game so that you won't make any stupid mistakes.

steps.title: End the night and celebrate!
steps.content: End the night and celebrate! Now you can become the king of FNaF and tell this to your friends!
